title: Khalistanis playing football with Indian national flag in Canada
selftext: The hate transpires beyond demand for a seperate nation and opposition of BJP to desecration of national flag. As a Punjabi, i feel ashamed that these ungrateful buffoons have fallen so low.
comments: Fucking shits need to be eradicated
12 baje baad in logo ki satak jati hai waise bhi
